mapper.select: SELECT fish_no, fish_type, taste_type, fish_file_no, fish_name, temperature, ration_time, top_or_bottom, tendency, field, light, origin_name FROM public.fish JOIN public.fish_attachment using(fish_file_no) ORDER BY fish_no ASC

SELECT fish_no, fish_type, taste_type, fish_file_no, fish_name, temperature, ration_time, top_or_bottom, tendency, field, light, origin_name FROM public.fish JOIN public.fish_attachment using(fish_file_no) WHERE fish_name like'%' || #{fishName} || '%' ORDER BY fish_no ASC

SELECT fish_no, fish_type, taste_type, fish_file_no, fish_name, temperature, ration_time, top_or_bottom, tendency, field, light, origin_name FROM public.fish JOIN public.fish_attachment using(fish_file_no) WHERE fish_type = #{cate} ORDER BY fish_no ASC

SELECT fish_no, fish_type, taste_type, fish_file_no, fish_name, temperature, ration_time, top_or_bottom, tendency, field, light, origin_name, caution, scientific_name, grow_together, environment, life_span, feed_type FROM public.fish JOIN public.fish_attachment using(fish_file_no) JOIN public.feed using(taste_type) WHERE fish_name = #{fishName}
